A class that interacts with the plugin's database.

An abstract class serving as a template to every command of the plugin.

The plugin's controller.

A TabCompleter class for the command mhlWorldBorder
MultipleHardcoreLives
The main class of the plugin.
Player
A model storing the data of a player for the server it's currently in.
PlayerList
A view made to replace the player list to display the number of lives of the players and to color their name.
PlayerListener
Listens to every useful event related to player and sends it to its controller.
PlayerTabCompleter
A TabCompleter class for the command player
Server
A model that stores data about the server and its players.
ServerTabCompleter
A TabCompleter class for the command server
Session
A model stocking information about a session
SessionEvent
A model for describing an event in a session
SessionEvents
An enumeration for every registered kinds of events
SessionManager
A class that contains the logic of the plugin for its sessions.
SessionTabCompleter
A TabCompleter class for the command session
TableFactory
A class for creating SQLite tables in the database
